urls.title: BFI Flare x BAFTA Mentoring
urls.description: BAFTA supports LGBTQ+ identified filmmakers by providing mentors to the BFI Flare x BAFTA Crew programme

data.text:
Our @BFIFlare x BAFTA Mentoring programme which aims to showcase and support the next generation of LGBTQIA+ creatives is now OPEN! 🎉

Applications for the programme which is delivered in partnership with @bfinetwork close Friday 6 January. Apply here👉 https://t.co/5mCD0Qb4s8 https://t.co/Roh4mqmNGX

We were thrilled to welcome celebrated Indian filmmaker, Sanjay Leela Bhansali for a masterclass at BAFTA's London HQ last week. We caught up with Sanjay to learn more about his career, his creative process and his latest movie Gangubai Kathiawadi 👇

📢Calling all short filmmakers! We’ve partnered with the @BritishCouncil and @BFINETWORK to create The Short Film Toolkit. This vital resource features everything you need to know about getting your film made and seen 👉https://t.co/7t1fOdYxtx https://t.co/biQsg16ZvZ

A huge congratulation to the #BIFA2022 winners! 🎉 https://t.co/85PPN5jckC

We're super excited to listen to Kate Hudson talk about her incredible on-screen career at our upcoming sold-out Life In Pictures event, supported by @tclmobileglobal 🎬 

Stay up to date with all the latest BAFTA events by signing up to our newsletter 👇
Adam Driver cutting through the White Noise. https://t.co/WQRHrR1Toj

We were saddened to hear that BAFTA-winning producer and screenwriter, Derek Granger died yesterday at the age of 101. 

Amongst his many credits is the multi award-winning Brideshead Revisited. Our thoughts are with his family at this time. https://t.co/13dbwI2xuy

urls.title: BAFTA’s Children & Young People Awards 2022 - Winners
urls.description: The official list of winners for the 2022 BAFTA Children & Young People Awards

data.text:
That brings us to the end of the evening. Huge congratulations to all the winners and nominees! Discover the full list below 👇 #BAFTAycp
https://t.co/rZ4HkpFG9O
And the last award of the night goes to George Webster who wins the Presenter Award! #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/eTZ8hgtoKn
And a second win for The Snail And The Whale! Well done to Max Lang and Daniel Snaddon for winning for Director #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/8pmFeQsUdF
Congratulations to Chris O’Dowd for winning in the performer category for Here We Are: Notes for Living on Planet Earth #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/Rj9A2psDUy
Great job to everyone who worked on Wolfwalkers! Your hard work paid off with a win in the Feature Film category #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/pFSi2HPBTg
Dodger just won the Scripted Award! Congratulations #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/I5e5UyijWR
The Non-Scripted win goes to FYI: Ukraine Invasion Special. Well done on your amazing work! #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/gN4LNmr8Dy
What a big adventure for Sackboy: A Big Adventure who just won in the Game category! #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/mww0tnw1Qv
@OfficialBlueyTV The Snail and the Whale charmed their way to a win in the Animation category! Congratulations to the entire team #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/HG2rtFZANg
All the way from Australia, Bluey came to win the International category! #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/eeSVsiB4KF
Well done to everyone behind El Deafo for winning Content For Change! #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/LSyu3QUESW
We hope the team at Lovely Little Farm is having a lovely little time this evening celebrating their win for Pre-School Live Action #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/UZnjgMm6VF
HEY DUGGEE just won the Pre-School Animation Award! Congratulations #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/3UtiZO0bqS
A big round of applause for Taiya Samuel for winning Young Performer for her role in JoJo & Gran Gran #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/KilW26qhGd
Congratulations to Joe Markham, Mic Graves and Tony Hull who kick off the night with their win in the Writer category for The Amazing World of Gumball #BAFTAcyp https://t.co/yPkjBpvuHI

urls.title: Children & Young People Festival: Saturday Morning
urls.description: Celebrate the nominations of the Children & Young People Awards, and find out more about BAFTA’s outreach work and initiatives. Hosted by TV presenters Alishea Campbell-Drummond and Ben Shires, this session includes a 75 minute showcase with opportunities to hear from and question nominees across film, games and TV.  Followed by activities across BAFTA’s initiatives: Young Creators, Young Game Designers and Young Presenters. Please join us for plenty of photo opportunities, exclusive partner content and a few freebies, as well as a great day out for families and younger audiences alike.

urls.title: TV Masterclass: For the love of…Reality TV
urls.description: This session will examine how the genre continues to evolve and delve into the balance required between constructing a series and the need for authenticity, as viewers crave more relatability, originality and drama.

data.text:

urls.title: FN Education TV - First News Education
urls.description: First News Education TV is an exciting web-based channel with programmes presented by kids for kids, and films that open up a window on the world they are growing up in. In an educational setting, they provide a stimulus to investigate and understand a wide range of diverse and important global issues. All are ideal for topical assemblies and English, PSHE, citizenship and humanities lessons. The content on the channel brings together the experience of First News and Fresh Start Media, an Emmy and BAFTA-winning television and online production company specialising in content for young people and schools. FYI: For Your Info Welcome to a world of info for kids! FYI: For Your Info is an award-winning weekly news show from Sky Kids. Broadcast 52 weeks a year, FYI investigates the big issues young people need info on. The show not only puts children in the know but also gives them a platform on which they can be heard. With reports from across the globe, explainers, debates, Fake News or Fa

tweets.text: We only went and won a #BAFTAkids award for our amazing news show @FYI_SkyTV presented by children for children. Watch it now at https://t.co/i2IWjj6mdb Thanks to all at @FreshStart_TV, @SkyNews and our talented team of young presenters. We dedicated the award to child refugees. https://t.co/ZMGtuiBdJp

urls.title: BAFTA
urls.description: The British Academy of Film and Television Arts (BAFTA) is the leading UK charity that supports, promotes and develops talent in film, games and television.

tweets.text:
With less than a week until the #BAFTAScotAwards 2022, hosted by @edibow, let's take a trip down memory lane to our last full, in-person ceremony in 2019 and get hyped for what's sure to be a brilliant evening ✨

Stream via https://t.co/d1giEfvbVX 17:30 GMT, 20 November https://t.co/QCA8WTVihy

This week we met with some of the @BAFTA EE Rising Star jury panel who gathered to select the 2023 nominees ahead of the #EEBAFTAs. Feat. Hayley Atwell, @theotherjoecole Jason Flemyng + BAFTA's @AnnaEHiggs. YOU will get the final vote! Who do you want on the shortlist? https://t.co/sk4m3naNky
FYI @BAFTA 👀 https://t.co/nZfFPyXLCI

urls.title: BAFTA Breakthrough stars Jack Rooke, Nell Barlow and Runyararo Mapfumo on inclusive storytelling
urls.description: We spoke to Jack Rooke, Nell Barlow and Runyararo Mapfumo about making the BAFTA Breakthrough talent 2022 list.

tweets.text:
We spoke to @jackrooke, @Runyararo_M and Nell Barlow about making the #BAFTABreakthrough talent 2022 list and how they created must-watch LGBTQ+ moments this year 🌈

https://t.co/pHu83hrloo

urls.title: Meet the 2022 UK Breakthroughs
urls.description: Find out more about this year's BAFTA Breakthrough UK participants, the talented newcomers across film, games and television as selected by a jury including Ade Rawcliffe, Fiona Lamptey, Marianne Jean-Baptiste, Emma Lawson, Lauren Evans, and Breakthrough alumnae Ruth Madeley and Charu Desodt. Find out more about the initiative >  To contact a BAFTA Breakthrough participant, email breakthrough@bafta.org

tweets.text:
It's absolutely bewildering and so lovely that @Voxels and me are BAFTA Breaktrough together this year - along with so many incredible people🥲

https://t.co/cPEMAFxmIx
#BAFTABreakthrough @BAFTAGames https://t.co/2SjQRLAw0s

Honoured and very excited to be selected as a BAFTA Breakthrough for 2022 alongside an amazing group of people. @BAFTA 

#BAFTABreakthrough @BAFTAGames

BAFTA Breakthrough baaaaaby!!!

@BAFTA @BAFTAUS https://t.co/WHL9G2B8Bi
A massive congratulations to Alex Pritz on being selected as part of this year’s @BAFTA Breakthrough! 👏👏👏 #TheTerritory https://t.co/o7pu6akb4x

Chuffed to be included among a brilliant and inclusive group of artists and creatives for #BAFTABreakthrough 2022/23. Big thanks to the team @BAFTA for this fantastic opportunity. 1/5 https://t.co/gC64JDbMJR

urls.title: Sophie Cunningham - Producer and Director | BAFTA Breakthrough 2022
urls.description: Sophie discovered her passion for television at a young age. Traditional education was hard for her and documentaries became a haven, providing a more access...

tweets.text:
Sophie Cunningham (@socun) had her directorial debut with the @skytv doc Look Away, which shines a light on the stories of women who were sexually abused by rock stars in the ‘70s and ‘80s 
https://t.co/Y6BhxwbWyV

I am grateful to be selected as a @BAFTA Breakthrough Brit this year alongside a bunch of very talented people.
BAFTA do lots of good things on top of awards, they mentor and support too, and I'm excited to be a part of it!

What a year this is turning out to be. 

‘Gratitude’ is the word that keeps finding its way back to me.

THANK YOU @BAFTA for recognising me as a Breakthrough Talent. https://t.co/rlJD3EUY0E
@BAFTA @BBCOne Thank you so much Bafta for this breakthrough award for Leon. He is over the moon and thrilled that the news is finally out.

Super honored and very excited to be selected as a BAFTA Breakthrough for 2022 alongside an amazing group of people. @BAFTA 

But most importantly, a breakthrough with @viiolaceus :D 

#BAFTABreakthrough @BAFTAGames https://t.co/KpK28oqDdi
Brandon Perea has been selected for BAFTA Breakthrough 2022. https://t.co/0eTKXQySgs

I’m a tank-topped -̶b̶u̶m̶-̶b̶o̶y̶- BAFTA breakthrough! 🤪🙌💥

thank you @bafta for choosing Big Boys as my breakthrough project. It’s very much a collaborative effort & I’d be nout without @AlrightJim, @katbuckle, @Roughcut_TV & the whole Big Boys gang! 

📸 by Sophia Spring https://t.co/BiJKpbEwLZ

I can barely believe I’m writing this, but absolutely over the moon to have been chosen as a BAFTA Breakthrough for 2022. @BAFTA is such an incredible organisation and I'm so honoured to stand amongst a group of such incredibly talented people! 💖
#BAFTABreakthrough #GameAudio https://t.co/2rUw6avNun

I can finally share that I have been chosen as a 2022/23 BAFTA Breakthrough. I am in incredible company - this years cohort is the most talented group of people I've ever met. Excited for what's to come! @BAFTA 

#BAFTABreakthrough @BAFTAGames 

Photo credit: BAFTA/Sophia Spring. https://t.co/lrvA8tcLIh

Rebeca Huntt, Director

Rebeca's Breakthrough project is the documentary memoir Beba,  in which Rebeca explores her own identity as a young NYC-born and bred Afro-Latina and stares down historical, societal, and generational trauma. https://t.co/9vr3DoyxPJ

Melissa Adeyemo, Producer

Melissa's Breakthrough project is the feature film Eyimofe, which tells the story of two women in Lagos, both seeking to move to Europe in hopes of a better life.

📸 BAFTA/Jessica Chou https://t.co/pddtW4dde9

Megan Fox, Founder and Game Programmer

@glassbottommeg's Breakthrough project is the video game SkateBIRD, a game about a little skateboarding bird that tries their best. https://t.co/hw31wl6WxG

Ellie Foumbi, Writer and Director

@EllieAnette's Breakthrough project is the feature film Our Father, The Devil, an ethical and psychological thriller about an African immigrant whose life is upended by the arrival of a charismatic priest. https://t.co/nn0YNaRPrS

annotations.normalized_text: The Angry Black Girl and Her Monster

tweets.text:
Daphne Wu, Cinematographer

Daphne's Breakthrough projects are the documentary Accepted, and the feature film The Angry Black Girl and Her Monster, which tells the story of a teenage anti-hero on a desperate quest to cure death.

📸 BAFTA/Jessica Chou https://t.co/x9zWTbrmOJ

Charlotte Hornsby, Cinematographer

Charlotte's Breakthrough project is the feature film Master, a thriller about two women who are driven out of an Ivy League university by social and supernatural forces. 

📸 BAFTA/Jessica Chou https://t.co/8eerpWQhXw

annotations.normalized_text: The Sex Lives of Colleges Girls

tweets.text:
Alex Pritz, Director

Alex's Breakthrough project is the documentary film The Territory which looks at the tireless fight of the Indigenous Uru-eu-wau-wau people against the encroaching deforestation brought by farmers and illegal settlers in the Brazilian Amazon. https://t.co/Th9g2B5I9E

Meet the 2022 cohort of BAFTA Breakthrough USA 💫

As @BAFTA's flagship talent initiative, the program supports creatives in film, games, and TV with support at their critical ‘breakthrough’ moment.

#BAFTABreakthrough is supported by @Netflix.

Meet this year's cohort below ⬇️
